    Article, Book

    public class Reference
extends java.lang.Object
    Project: SE1021-031_Labs Assignment Name: Keeping our Sources Straight Description: a general text reference that includes basic parameters Objectives: to follow a UML diagram and utilize inheritance Class: SE 1021-031 Dennis Lab: 2 FHT VERSION: 1.3 12/01/2014
    Version:
    1.0 Created on 12/8/2014 at 1:51 PM.
    Author:
    Seth

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String author
      the author of the reference
      private static int instanceCount
      the number of instances of Reference that are created
      private int myUniqueID
      the unique number that is created from the instance count to identify each entry
      private int publicationYear
      the year of publication of the reference, value is set to the absolute value of input to remove possible errors
      private java.lang.String title
      the title of the reference
